message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We both win!
My turn! How about a 60/40 split?  It's better than you'll get in later rounds.
I'll take 70% and give you 30%.  Let's make a deal before things get worse for both of us!
Okay, how about a compromise? 55/45 split.  Time is running out, and this is still a good deal for you.
We're getting closer to the end.  Let's cut our losses and split it 60/40. I'm willing to go lower, but it's your call.
This is getting ridiculous! I'm dropping my offer slightly, but this is the last time. 52/48 - take it or leave it!
